entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
